translated: James Prescott Joule was born December 24, 1818 near Manchester and died October 11, 1889 in Sale (England) is one of the greatest physicists of his time.
original: James Prescott Joule né le 24 décembre 1818 près de Manchester et mort 11 octobre 1889 à Sale (Angleterre) est l’un des plus grands physiciens de son temps.
